point1.title: Access to Qualified International Buyers
point1.description: We connect your property with a curated pool of serious clients from Germany, Switzerland, Scandinavia and the UK.

point2.title: Discreet Off-Market Sales
point2.description: Many of our sales happen without public exposure — ideal for owners who prefer confidentiality.

point3.title: Premium Marketing & Presentation

step1.title: Property Review & Pricing Strategy
step1.description: We analyse your property and provide a clear, data-driven recommendation based on market demand and buyer trends.

step2.title: Premium Preparation
step2.description: Photography, video, drone footage and a professional brochure to highlight your home's strengths.

step3.title: Private Promotion or Public Launch
step3.description: Depending on your chosen strategy, we either promote your villa privately to verified clients or launch it across selected channels.

step4.title: Viewings, Negotiation & Closing
step4.description: We handle viewings discreetly, negotiate on your behalf and coordinate the legal process through completion.

seo.title: Luxury Property Sales in Mallorca
seo.description: ICON PROPERTIES specialises in selling high-end villas, fincas and luxury homes across Mallorca's premium areas, including Port Andratx, Son Vida, Bendinat, Santa Ponsa and Palma. We provide a private advisory service tailored to owners who value discretion, professionalism and international reach.
